original_text: Christ himself did this to bring us to himself as a beautiful group of his people. His church would belong to him completely. It would be pure, without anything bad to spoil it.
korean_text: 자기 앞에 영광스러운 교회로 세우사 티나 주름 잡힌 것이나 이런 것들이 없이 거룩하고 흠이 없게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: as a beautiful group of his people
His church would belong to him completely
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 교회는 온전히 그에게 속할 것이다

sentences.original_text: without anything bad to spoil it
